name: LEAVES - The Return
description: Mononino and the Treefruities fared well without you - until another disaster scattered the leaves of their home tree. Once more, take on the journey and challenging puzzles along the way.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 or better Processor: 2Ghz Pentium T4200 Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
